# Getting and Cleaning Data Course Project

This repository hosts the R code and documentation files for the Data Science's track course "Getting and Cleaning data", available in coursera.

## Files

`CodeBook.md` explains how to use the code below,the variables and the data used, and any transformations or work that was performed to clean up the data.

`run_analysis.R` contains the code to perform the analyses described in the 5 parts. The whole project can be launched in RStudio by just importing the file.
